verses.verse: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Then the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses עַתָּ֣ה <S%H6258><s%> Now תִרְאֶ֔ה <S%H7200><s%> Now shalt thou see אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> what אֶֽעֱשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> what I will do לְפַרְעֹ֑ה <S%H6547><s%> to Pharaoh כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for בְיָ֤ד <S%H3027><s%> hand חֲזָקָה֙ <S%H2389><s%> for with a strong יְשַׁלְּחֵ֔ם <S%H7971><s%> shall he let them go וּבְיָ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> hand חֲזָקָ֔ה <S%H2389><s%> and with a strong יְגָרְשֵׁ֖ם <S%H1644><s%> shall he drive them out מֵאַרְצֽוֹ׃ <S%H776><s%> of his land ס

וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> And God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about מֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> about אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto him I [am] the LORD

וָאֵרָ֗א <S%H7200><s%> And I appeared אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַבְרָהָ֛ם <S%H85><s%> unto Abraham אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יִצְחָ֥ק <S%H3327><s%> unto Isaac וְאֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> and יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> and unto Jacob בְּאֵ֣ל <S%H410><s%> by [the name of] God שַׁדָּ֑י <S%H7706><s%> Almighty וּשְׁמִ֣י <S%H8034><s%> but by my name יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> JEHOVAH לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not נוֹדַ֖עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> was I not known לָהֶֽם׃

וְגַ֨ם <S%H1571><s%> also הֲקִמֹ֤תִי <S%H6965><s%> And I have also established אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּרִיתִי֙ <S%H1285><s%> my covenant אִתָּ֔ם <S%H854><s%> for לָתֵ֥ת <S%H5414><s%> with them to give לָהֶ֖ם אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> them the land כְּנָ֑עַן <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land מְגֻרֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H4033><s%> of their pilgrimage אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which גָּ֥רוּ <S%H1481><s%> wherein they were strangers בָֽהּ׃

וְגַ֣ם ׀ <S%H1571><s%> Furthermore אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I שָׁמַ֗עְתִּי <S%H8085><s%> And I have also heard אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> נַאֲקַת֙ <S%H5009><s%> the groaning בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whom מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> the Egyptians מַעֲבִדִ֣ים <S%H5647><s%> keep in bondage אֹתָ֑ם <S%H853><s%> וָאֶזְכֹּ֖ר <S%H2142><s%> and I have remembered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּרִיתִֽי׃ <S%H1285><s%> my covenant

לָכֵ֞ן <S%H3651><s%> Wherefore אֱמֹ֥ר <S%H559><s%> say לִבְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֮ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָה֒ <S%H3068><s%> I [am] the LORD וְהוֹצֵאתִ֣י <S%H3318><s%> and I will bring אֶתְכֶ֗ם <S%H853><s%> מִתַּ֙חַת֙ <S%H8478><s%> under סִבְלֹ֣ת <S%H5450><s%> you out from under the burdens מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of the Egyptians וְהִצַּלְתִּ֥י <S%H5337><s%> and I will rid אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> מֵעֲבֹדָתָ֑ם <S%H5656><s%> you out of their bondage וְגָאַלְתִּ֤י <S%H1350><s%> and I will redeem אֶתְכֶם֙ <S%H853><s%> בִּזְר֣וֹעַ <S%H2220><s%> out arm נְטוּיָ֔ה <S%H5186><s%> you with a stretched וּבִשְׁפָטִ֖ים <S%H8201><s%> judgments גְּדֹלִֽים׃ <S%H1419><s%> and with great

וְלָקַחְתִּ֨י <S%H3947><s%> And I will take אֶתְכֶ֥ם <S%H853><s%> לִי֙ לְעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> you to me for a people וְהָיִ֥יתִי <S%H1961><s%> become לָכֶ֖ם לֵֽאלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> and I will be to you a God וִֽידַעְתֶּ֗ם <S%H3045><s%> and ye shall know כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֤י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD אֱלֹ֣הֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> your God הַמּוֹצִ֣יא <S%H3318><s%> which bringeth אֶתְכֶ֔ם <S%H853><s%> מִתַּ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> under סִבְל֥וֹת <S%H5450><s%> you out from under the burdens מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of the Egyptians

וְהֵבֵאתִ֤י <S%H935><s%> And I will bring אֶתְכֶם֙ <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> you in unto the land אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which נָשָׂ֙אתִי֙ <S%H5375><s%> accept אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָדִ֔י <S%H3027><s%> able לָתֵ֣ת <S%H5414><s%> to give אֹתָ֔הּ <S%H853><s%> לְאַבְרָהָ֥ם <S%H85><s%> it to Abraham לְיִצְחָ֖ק <S%H3327><s%> to Isaac וּֽלְיַעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> and to Jacob וְנָתַתִּ֨י <S%H5414><s%> and I will give אֹתָ֥הּ <S%H853><s%> לָכֶ֛ם מוֹרָשָׁ֖ה <S%H4181><s%> it you for an heritage אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> I [am] the LORD

וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake מֹשֶׁ֛ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses כֵּ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> thus אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> so unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> did not שָֽׁמְעוּ֙ <S%H8085><s%> but they hearkened אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> not unto Moses מִקֹּ֣צֶר <S%H7115><s%> for anguish ר֔וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> of spirit וּמֵעֲבֹדָ֖ה <S%H5656><s%> bondage קָשָֽׁה׃ <S%H7186><s%> and for cruel פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

בֹּ֣א <S%H935><s%> Go דַבֵּ֔ר <S%H1696><s%> in speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about פַּרְעֹ֖ה <S%H6547><s%> unto Pharaoh מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וִֽישַׁלַּ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> go out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> that he let the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מֵאַרְצֽוֹ׃ <S%H776><s%> of his land

וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> spake מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying הֵ֤ן <S%H2005><s%> Behold בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> Behold the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not שָׁמְע֣וּ <S%H8085><s%> have not hearkened אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> to me וְאֵיךְ֙ <S%H349><s%> how יִשְׁמָעֵ֣נִי <S%H8085><s%> hear פַרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> unto me how then shall Pharaoh וַאֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> me עֲרַ֥ל <S%H6189><s%> who [am] of uncircumcised שְׂפָתָֽיִם׃ <S%H8193><s%> band פ

וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses וְאֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> and to אַהֲרֹן֒ <S%H175><s%> and unto Aaron וַיְצַוֵּם֙ <S%H6680><s%> and gave them a charge אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to פַּרְעֹ֖ה <S%H6547><s%> and unto Pharaoh מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt לְהוֹצִ֥יא <S%H3318><s%> to bring אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt ס

אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These רָאשֵׁ֣י <S%H7218><s%> These [be] the heads בֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> houses אֲבֹתָ֑ם <S%H1><s%> of their fathers' בְּנֵ֨י <S%H1121><s%> The sons רְאוּבֵ֜ן <S%H7205><s%> of Reuben בְּכֹ֣ר <S%H1060><s%> the firstborn יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel חֲנ֤וֹךְ <S%H2585><s%> Hanoch וּפַלּוּא֙ <S%H6396><s%> and Pallu חֶצְר֣וֹן <S%H2696><s%> Hezron וְכַרְמִ֔י <S%H3756><s%> and Carmi אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these מִשְׁפְּחֹ֥ת <S%H4940><s%> these [be] the families רְאוּבֵֽן׃ <S%H7205><s%> of Reuben

וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons שִׁמְע֗וֹן <S%H8095><s%> of Simeon יְמוּאֵ֨ל <S%H3223><s%> Jemuel וְיָמִ֤ין <S%H3226><s%> and Jamin וְאֹ֙הַד֙ <S%H161><s%> and Ohad וְיָכִ֣ין <S%H3199><s%> and Jachin וְצֹ֔חַר <S%H6714><s%> and Zohar וְשָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> and Shaul בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֑ית <S%H3669><s%> of a Canaanitish woman אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these מִשְׁפְּחֹ֥ת <S%H4940><s%> these [are] the families שִׁמְעֽוֹן׃ <S%H8095><s%> of Simeon

וְאֵ֨לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These שְׁמ֤וֹת <S%H8034><s%> And these [are] the names בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the sons לֵוִי֙ <S%H3878><s%> of Levi לְתֹ֣לְדֹתָ֔ם <S%H8435><s%> according to their generations גֵּרְשׁ֕וֹן <S%H1648><s%> Gershon וּקְהָ֖ת <S%H6955><s%> and Kohath וּמְרָרִ֑י <S%H4847><s%> and Merari וּשְׁנֵי֙ <S%H8141><s%> and the years חַיֵּ֣י <S%H2416><s%> of the life לֵוִ֔י <S%H3878><s%> of Levi שֶׁ֧בַע <S%H7651><s%> and seven וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֛ים <S%H7970><s%> thirty וּמְאַ֖ת <S%H3967><s%> [were] an hundred שָׁנָֽה׃ <S%H8141><s%> years
בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> The sons גֵרְשׁ֛וֹן <S%H1648><s%> of Gershon לִבְנִ֥י <S%H3845><s%> Libni וְשִׁמְעִ֖י <S%H8096><s%> and Shimi לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָֽם׃ <S%H4940><s%> according to their families

וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons קְהָ֔ת <S%H6955><s%> of Kohath עַמְרָ֣ם <S%H6019><s%> Amram וְיִצְהָ֔ר <S%H3324><s%> and Izhar וְחֶבְר֖וֹן <S%H2275><s%> and Hebron וְעֻזִּיאֵ֑ל <S%H5816><s%> and Uzziel וּשְׁנֵי֙ <S%H8141><s%> and the years חַיֵּ֣י <S%H2416><s%> of the life קְהָ֔ת <S%H6955><s%> of Kohath שָׁלֹ֧שׁ <S%H7969><s%> and three וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֛ים <S%H7970><s%> thirty וּמְאַ֖ת <S%H3967><s%> [were] an hundred שָׁנָֽה׃ <S%H8141><s%> years

וּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons מְרָרִ֖י <S%H4847><s%> of Merari מַחְלִ֣י <S%H4249><s%> Mahali וּמוּשִׁ֑י <S%H4187><s%> and Mushi אֵ֛לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These מִשְׁפְּחֹ֥ת <S%H4940><s%> these [are] the families הַלֵּוִ֖י <S%H3878><s%> of Levi לְתֹלְדֹתָֽם׃ <S%H8435><s%> according to their generations

וַיִּקַּ֨ח <S%H3947><s%> took עַמְרָ֜ם <S%H6019><s%> And Amram אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יוֹכֶ֤בֶד <S%H3115><s%> him Jochebed דֹּֽדָתוֹ֙ <S%H1733><s%> his father's sister ל֣וֹ לְאִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H802><s%> to wife וַתֵּ֣לֶד <S%H3205><s%> and she bare ל֔וֹ אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> אַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> him Aaron וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> and Moses וּשְׁנֵי֙ <S%H8141><s%> and the years חַיֵּ֣י <S%H2416><s%> of the life עַמְרָ֔ם <S%H6019><s%> of Amram שֶׁ֧בַע <S%H7651><s%> and seven וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֛ים <S%H7970><s%> and thirty וּמְאַ֖ת <S%H3967><s%> [were] an hundred שָׁנָֽה׃ <S%H8141><s%> years
וּבְנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons יִצְהָ֑ר <S%H3324><s%> of Izhar קֹ֥רַח <S%H7141><s%> Korah וָנֶ֖פֶג <S%H5298><s%> and Nepheg וְזִכְרִֽי׃ <S%H2147><s%> and Zichri
וּבְנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons עֻזִּיאֵ֑ל <S%H5816><s%> of Uzziel מִֽישָׁאֵ֥ל <S%H4332><s%> Mishael וְאֶלְצָפָ֖ן <S%H469><s%> and Elzaphan וְסִתְרִֽי׃ <S%H5644><s%> and Zithri

וַיִּקַּ֨ח <S%H3947><s%> took אַהֲרֹ֜ן <S%H175><s%> And Aaron אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֱלִישֶׁ֧בַע <S%H472><s%> him Elisheba בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> daughter עַמִּינָדָ֛ב <S%H5992><s%> of Amminadab אֲח֥וֹת <S%H269><s%> sister נַחְשׁ֖וֹן <S%H5177><s%> of Naashon ל֣וֹ לְאִשָּׁ֑ה <S%H802><s%> to wife וַתֵּ֣לֶד <S%H3205><s%> and she bare ל֗וֹ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נָדָב֙ <S%H5070><s%> him Nadab וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲבִיה֔וּא <S%H30><s%> and Abihu אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶלְעָזָ֖ר <S%H499><s%> Eleazar וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אִֽיתָמָֽר׃ <S%H385><s%> and Ithamar

וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons קֹ֔רַח <S%H7141><s%> of Korah אַסִּ֥יר <S%H617><s%> Assir וְאֶלְקָנָ֖ה <S%H511><s%> and Elkanah וַאֲבִיאָסָ֑ף <S%H23><s%> and Abiasaph אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these מִשְׁפְּחֹ֥ת <S%H4940><s%> these [are] the families הַקָּרְחִֽי׃ <S%H7145><s%> of the Korhites

ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> These אַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> [are] that Aaron וּמֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> and Moses אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> to whom אָמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לָהֶ֔ם הוֹצִ֜יאוּ <S%H3318><s%> Bring out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵ֧י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> from the land מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> according צִבְאֹתָֽם׃ <S%H6635><s%> according to their armies
